## Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have checked for console errors in the browser

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly (README, inline docs, etc.)
- [ ] I have added/updated comments for complex logic
- [ ] Any new dependencies are documented

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested this in multiple browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge)
- [ ] I have tested responsive design on mobile devices

### Deployment
- [ ] My changes require updates to deployment configuration
- [ ] I have documented deployment considerations
- [ ] I have verified Docker build succeeds
- [ ] I have tested Kubernetes manifests (if applicable)
- [ ] Environment variables are documented (if new ones added)

### Security
- [ ] I have checked for security vulnerabilities
- [ ] No sensitive data (API keys, passwords, tokens) is committed
- [ ] Input validation is implemented where necessary
- [ ] XSS and injection vulnerabilities are addressed

### Accessibility
- [ ] I have verified keyboard navigation works
- [ ] I have added appropriate ARIA labels
- [ ] Color contrast meets WCAG standards
- [ ] Screen reader compatibility verified
